Name: Savings
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)٫ <u>Transient</u> (If ~ would enter your discard pile٫ instead remove it from the game.)\nAdd one energy of any type a generator you control could produce to your energy bank.

Name: P.O.T.U.S
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)٫ <u>Transient</u> (If ~ would enter your discard pile٫ instead remove it from the game.)\nAdd one energy of any type a generator you control could produce to your energy bank.

Name: Executive Execution
Rules: <u>Unfundable</u> (Banked energy can't be spent to deploy ~. Instead you must utilize generators as part of its cost.)\nKill a combatant of your choice.\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `P.O.T.U.S` back into your deck.)

Name: ATM
Rules: Each turn you may hire an additional `Savings` card in your hand as a generator (in addition to your once per turn generator)٫ it may be utilized and <u>Forefit</u> (Put the specified generator into your discard pile.) to add one energy of any type a generator you control could produce.

Name: Lunar Civilian
Flavor: Well kid... out here you have to be tough to survive!

Name: Public Transportation
Rules: <u>Vehicle</u> (When ~ enters the battlefield٫ you may choose another asset to attach it to. The combined unit has all effects of both assets٫ and the highest attack power٫ health٫ and ranged status of the two.)

Name: Popular Girl
Rules: <u>Unfundable</u> (Banked energy can't be spent to deploy ~. Instead you must utilize generators as part of its cost.)\nWhenever an <u>Explicitly Female</u> (Assets which say Female in their type) assets enters the battlefield٫ draw a card.

Name: Stereotypical Jock
Rules: <u>Unfundable</u> (Banked energy can't be spent to deploy ~. Instead you must utilize generators as part of its cost.)\nOther <u>Explicitly Male</u> (Assets which say Male in their type) assets you control get +1/+0.

Name: Ballistic Pistol
Rules: <u>Ammo 10</u> (Whenever the attached asset attacks or intercepts٫ reduce ~'s ammo by 1 [to a minimum of 0.] Instead of firing an ammo you may treat ~ as if it had ammo 0 until end of turn.)٫ <u>Gun</u> (As long as ~ has ammo remaining٫ the attached asset is ranged.)٫ <u>Tradeable</u>\nAs long as ~ has ammo remaining٫ the attached asset gets +1/+0.

Name: Angel's Katana
Rules: <u>Tradeable</u> (Once each turn while reorganizing units٫ you may pay ~'s cost٫ if you do choose another asset to attach ~ to.)٫ <u>Sword</u> (The attached asset is melee and anything that would make it ranged is negated as long as ~ is attached.)\nWhen ~ enters the battlefield٫ choose a combatant to attach it to.\nThe attached combatant gets +2/+0٫ and <u>Permanence</u> (Damage the attached asset deals is not removed at end of turn.)

Name: Battle Angel
Rules: <u>Armed -- `Angel's Katana`</u> (~ enters with an `Angel's Katana` attached.)

Name: Augmented Psycho
Rules: <u>Reckless</u> (~ can't intercept)

Name: Adrenaline Raddled Pilot
Rules: <u>Airdrop</u> (You may choose to have ~ deploy immediately [no deployment period]٫ but you have a 25% to <u>Forfeit</u> it unless you pay half of its cost again [rounded up.])

Name: Battle Drone
Rules: <u>Armor 4</u> (Negate the first 4 damage ~ would take each turn.)

Name: Inexhaustible Detective
Rules: <u>Armed -- `Ballistic Pistol`</u> (~ enters with a `Ballistic Pistol` attached.)٫ <u>Inexhaustible</u> (Attacking and intercepting for the first time each turn doesn't utilize ~.)

Name: Personal Defense Drone
Rules: <u>Flying</u> (~ can only be intercepted by assets with ranged or flying. If ~ is intercepting you may choose another adjacent combatant or commander you control٫ that is not also intercepting٫ to take the damage instead.)

Name: Imparter of Wisdom
Rules: <u>Once</u> (As you activate this effect٫ remove it from this card): All other combatants without effects permanently get +2/+2.

Name: Trash Collector
Rules: [T]: Look at the top card of your deck٫ you may put it into your discard pile.\n[T]٫ Remove a card in your discard pile from the game: Add one energy of any of its types to your bank.

Name: Farmer
Rules: <u>Once</u> (As you activate this effect٫ remove it from this card): Add one energy of any type to your bank.

Name: Corpse Wearing Demon
Rules:
([G] must be paid with energy from an explicitly generic source.)
<u>Unfundable</u> (Banked energy can't be spent to deploy ~. Instead you must utilize generators as part of its cost.)
Whenever ~ attacks٫ you may place a card in your discard pile under ~.
~ has all keywords of cards under it.
Flavor: An eternal war wages in the shadows...

Name: Guardian Angel
Rules: ([G] must be paid with energy from an explicitly generic source.)\n<u>Unkillable</u> (~ can't be killed.)٫ <u>Unfundable</u> (Banked energy can't be spent to deploy ~. Instead you must utilize generators as part of its cost.)\n[T]: Transfer ~'s <u>Unkillable</u> to another combatant.
Flavor: ...One the humans must never learn of.

Name: Morale
Rules: Choose a combatant type٫ all assets of that type permanently get +1/+1.
Flavor: “When strong٫ avoid them. If of high morale٫ depress them. Seem humble to fill them with conceit..." ~Sun Tzu

Name: Training Dummy
Rules: <u>Virtual</u> (Virtual cards can only interact with and choose other virtual cards [this includes commanders].)

Name: Virtual Enhancement
Rules: <u>Virtual</u> (Virtual cards can only interact with and choose other virtual cards [this includes commanders].)\nChoose a virtual asset to permanently get +1/+1.
